verses.verse: Then he <S%H7725>brought<s%> me <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> which <S%H6437>looks<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and it was <S%H5462>shut.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me; <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut,<s%> it shall not be <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> in by it; <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> has <S%H935>entered<s%> in by it, therefore it shall be <S%H5462>shut.<s%>

It is for the <S%H5387>prince;<s%> the <S%H5387>prince,<s%> he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> in it to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of that <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the same.

Then <S%H935>brought<s%> he me the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>mark<s%> well, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H1696>say<s%> to you concerning <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>laws<s%> thereof; and <S%H7760>mark<s%> well the <S%H3996>entering<s%> in of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> with <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4161>going<s%> <S%H4161>forth<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H4805>rebellious,<s%> even to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> O you <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> you of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%>

In that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> into my sanctuary <S%H1121>strangers,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> to be in my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> to <S%H2490>pollute<s%> it, <S%H853>even<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> when you <S%H7126>offer<s%> my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and they have <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H413>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

And you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of my <S%H6944>holy<s%> things: but you have <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of my <S%H4931>charge<s%> in my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for yourselves.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H1121>stranger,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart,<s%> nor <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1121>stranger<s%> <S%H5236><s%> that is <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that are gone away <S%H7350>far<s%> from me, when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8582>went<s%> <S%H8582>astray,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8582>went<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> away from me <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols;<s%> they shall even <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Yet they shall be <S%H8334>ministers<s%> in my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> having <S%H6486>charge<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8334>ministering<s%> to the <S%H1004>house:<s%> they shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering and the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to them.

<S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to them <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and caused the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4383>fall<s%> into <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And they shall not <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to me, to do the office of a <S%H3547>priest<s%> to me, nor to <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H3605>any<s%> of my <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, in the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place: but they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame,<s%> and their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>

But I will make them <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> thereof, and for <S%H3605>all<s%> that shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> therein.

But the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8582>went<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> from me, they shall <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to me to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to me, and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H7126>offer<s%> to me the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%>

They shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and they shall <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to my <S%H7979>table,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to me, and they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4931>charge.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that when they <S%H935>enter<s%> in <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> they shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6785>wool<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> on them, whiles they <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and <S%H1004>within.<s%>

They shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H6287>bonnets<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> on their <S%H4975>loins;<s%> they shall not <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with any thing that causes <S%H3154>sweat.<s%>

And when they <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> even <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> they shall <S%H6584>put<s%> off their <S%H899>garments<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they <S%H8334>ministered,<s%> and <S%H3240>lay<s%> them in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> and they shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> and they shall not <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with their <S%H899>garments.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall they <S%H1548>shave<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> suffer their <S%H6545>locks<s%> to <S%H7971>grow<s%> long; they shall <S%H3697>only<s%> <S%H3697>poll<s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> when they <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> for their <S%H802>wives<s%> a <S%H490>widow,<s%> nor her that is <S%H1644>put<s%> away: but they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1330>maidens<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or a <S%H490>widow<s%> that <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H3548>priest<s%> before.

And they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the difference <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and <S%H2455>profane,<s%> and cause them to <S%H3045>discern<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

And in <S%H7379>controversy<s%> they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in <S%H8199>judgment;<s%> and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> it according to my <S%H4941>judgments:<s%> and they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H8451>laws<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4150>assemblies;<s%> and they shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H120>person<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves: but for <S%H1>father,<s%> or for <S%H517>mother,<s%> or for <S%H1121>son,<s%> or for <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> for <S%H251>brother,<s%> or for <S%H269>sister<s%> that has <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>husband,<s%> they may <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves.
And <S%H310>after<s%> he is <S%H2893>cleansed,<s%> they shall <S%H5608>reckon<s%> to him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H935>goes<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And it shall be to them for an <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> I am their <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H272>possession<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I am their <S%H272>possession.<s%>

They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering: and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2764>dedicated<s%> thing in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H1992>theirs.<s%>

And the <S%H7225>first<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> things, and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of <S%H3605>all,<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> sort of your <S%H8641>oblations,<s%> shall be the <S%H3548>priest's:<s%> you shall also <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough,<s%> that he may cause the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> in your <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing that is <S%H5038>dead<s%> of itself, or <S%H2966>torn,<s%> <S%H4480>whether<s%> it be <S%H5775>fowl<s%> or <S%H929>beast.<s%>
